articles.title: ‘Jab dusre khelte hai aur aap paani pila rahe hai…’: Gambhir says ‘it will hurt’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former India opener Gautam Gambhir, who is also the mentor of LSG, the franchise KL Rahul leads in the IPL, said getting dropped from Indian T20I and Test sides should "hurt" the talented right-hander. | Cricket
